articles.content: India U-19 beat Pakistan U-19 by a resolute three-goal margin while also registering a clean-sheet in the final of the SAFF U-19 Championship at the Dashrath Rangasala on Saturday. The two sides were… [+5092 chars]

articles.author: Sports Desk
articles.title: Watch: Cristiano Ronaldo leads Al Nassr teammates, fans to Viking Clap celebrations - The Indian Express
articles.description: With the score tied at 1-1 in the 87th minute, Ronaldo would step in to take a penalty and sent the keeper the wrong way to put his team in front.
articles.content: Cristiano Ronaldo led the Al Nassr fans to a Viking Clap celebration after his late penalty earned the club a 2-1 win over Al-Tai on Friday.With the score tied at 1-1 in the 87th minute, Ronaldo woul… [+1565 chars]
